Title: Prevents relicensing of drivers who have been twice convicted of certain violations relating to driving
Summary: Prevents relicensing of drivers who have been twice convicted of certain violations relating to driving where physical injury occurs.
LawCode: Amd ยง1193, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to certain convictions which shall preclude relicensing of drivers
